mapper.select: select * from ky_appointment where phone = #{phone} order by shijian desc
SELECT count(keshi) as value, keshi as name FROM `ky_record` where phone = #{phone} GROUP BY keshi
select heart_rate as heartRate,temperature from daily_signs where phone = #{phone} order by create_time desc limit 1
select * from ky_advice where phone = #{phone} and riqi = #{adate} order by update_date desc
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as d, temperature as v from daily_signs where phone = #{phone} order by create_time desc limit 7
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as d,heart_rate as v from daily_signs where phone = #{phone} order by create_time desc limit 15
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as d,systolic_pressure as high,diastolic_pressure as low from daily_signs where phone = #{phone} order by create_time desc limit 15
